content: traverse scarf materials needed -2 skeins of sport weight yarn approx 340 yds each you will need 1 skein main color and 1 skein contrast size g crochet hook -or- -2 skeins of fingering weight yarn approx 400 yds each you will need 1 skein main color and 1 skein contrast size d crochet hook finished size length 60 width varies depending on the yarn weight notes to make all of the finishing work much easier you can weave in the ends after each color change as follows when you finish off the previous row lay the end from that row on top of the stitches then as you crochet the next row you will just crochet right over the yarn end so that it is enclosed in the stitches the chain 2 that is used to start the double_crochet row do not count as double_crochet do not work the stitches of the next row into the beginning chain 2 row 1 rs with cc chain 30 working in the back loop only for this row 2 treble_crochet in 4th chain from hook *treble_crochet in the next 5 chain skip the next 2 chain treble_crochet in the next 5 chain * 3 treble_crochet in next chain repeat from * to * once 2 treble_crochet in last chain finish off row 2 ws with mc join w/ single_crochet to first treble_crochet make another single_crochet in same st *single_crochet in next 5 treble_crochet skip the next 2 treble_crochet single_crochet in next 5 treble_crochet * 3 single_crochet in next treble_crochet repeat from * to * once 2 single_crochet in the last treble_crochet row 3 rs chain 2 turn 2 double_crochet in first single_crochet *double_crochet in next 5 single_crochet skip the next 2 single_crochet double_crochet in next 5 single_crochet * 3 double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * to * once 2 double_crochet in the last single_crochet row 4 ws chain 1 turn 2 single_crochet in first double_crochet *single_crochet in next 5 double_crochet skip the next 2 double_crochet single_crochet in next 5 double_crochet * 3 single_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * to * once 2 single_crochet in the last double_crochet row 5 repeat row 3 row 6 repeat row 4 row 7 repeat row 3 finish off row 8 ws join with cc and make 2 single_crochet in first double_crochet *single_crochet in next 5 double_crochet skip the next 2 double_crochet single_crochet in next 5 double_crochet * 3 single_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * to * once 2 single_crochet in the last double_crochet finish off row 9 rs with mc join w/ slip_stitch to first single_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same single_crochet *double_crochet in next 5 single_crochet skip the next 2 single_crochet double_crochet in next 5 single_crochet * 3 double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * to * once 2 double_crochet in the last single_crochet repeat row 4-9 until piece measures about 54 repeat row 4-7 once more work row 4 once more last row rs with cc chain 3 2 treble_crochet
